alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duval County through 300 PM EDT... At 213 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over downtown Jacksonville in flood prone areas. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Riverside, Tallyrand, and UF & Shands Hospital near Hogan`s Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
